#BlackMagicCraft #Episode212 #FallingDown

A huge thank you to Colossal Miniatures for sponsoring this video and for making this wonderful mini! Being able to do a diorama of one of my favourite movies was an absolute pleasure and I could not have done it without this "Bill" model.
